entities.name: george
entities.description: One of the Weasley twins who is mentioned as turning away and disappearing in the crowd.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: The other Weasley twin who is mentioned as turning away and disappearing in the crowd.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: A student who is mentioned as being disconcerted and scurrying away due to unfinished Transfiguration homework.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who suggests getting out of the Great Hall in case something happens.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who agrees with Hermione to leave the Great Hall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is summoned by Filch to see the headmistress.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: The caretaker who summons Harry to see the headmistress and is described as being best viewed at a distance.

entities.name: headmistress
entities.description: The person in charge of Hogwarts School who wants to see Harry.

relationships.description: Filch summons Harry to see the headmistress.
Hermione and Ron agree to leave the Great Hall together.
Harry is summoned by Filch to see the headmistress.
